4.title: Doctor in the Desert
4.plot: Todd visits an unlikely sheepherder in a New Mexico farming community and discovers there's much more than meets the eye. He randomly meets a woman who wants to spend the rest of her life serving the dead, as well as a man who spent nine months in a coma.

5.title: Who Is My Brother?
5.plot: Todd visits the border between two states and hears the incredible story of a man who donated his kidney to a stranger. Then he meets a woman who believes the view out her window is more important than money.

6.title: A Flower and a Pound Cake
6.plot:

1.title: The Trek Begins
1.plot: The spin of a pen, a random direction, and some strangers eating breakfast send Todd Hansen knocking on strangers' doors, where he finds amazing stories from everyday people.

2.title: Excited About Nothing
2.plot: Todd gets sent to one of the Rocky Mountain states, where he knocks on doors until someone agrees to be on TV. Todd then braves single-digit temperatures to find amazing human drama and even his own private rap concert.

3.title: Yesterday I Was in Jail
3.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

4.title: It's My Country
4.plot: Todd meets a WWII veteran who tells his amazing story. But it takes plenty of knocking before other people in this coastal state agree to be on the show.

5.title: A Tragic Twist
5.plot: Todd considers switching careers after being inspired by a wannabe rap star. The random stories Todd finds range from funny to compelling, with a shocking and tragic twist.

6.title: Every Day Is for Them
6.plot: Todd heads to the Deep South and comes across a tragic love story that began in India. Meet a girl who has always prayed to be on TV and a former truck driver trying to make ends meet after a nearly fatal heart attack.

7.title: Losing a Loved One
7.plot: Todd runs across the stories of a woman who grew up in a log cabin, a family that cherishes their children after a tragic loss, and a family from the Midwest who find themselves a long way from home.

8.title: The Big Apple
8.plot: Journey to America's heartland with Todd and discover amazing stories that all have one thing in common: the importance of marriage.

9.title: Olympic Dreams
9.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

10.title: A Rude Awakening
10.plot: A little bit of danger and a lot of frustration won't keep Todd from finding stories of people who are focused on taking care of others.

11.title: Extra Special Day
11.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

12.title: Light Where There Was No Light
12.plot: Todd stumbles across an amazing story of survival and gets a home makeover history lesson.

13.title: I Miss Him Every Day
13.plot: The crew ends up on the West Coast and meets a man who battled a deadly disease while living in a foreign country, and a family suffering from lay-offs due to the economy.

1.title: Culture Shock
1.plot: Todd and the crew find the most adventurous woman they may ever meet, a man who hopes to bring two cultures together, and a man who loves to find his own stories--in the past.

2.title: Be Good. Be Smart. Be Careful.
2.plot: Todd visits a historic location and meets exceptional people who survived childhood in desperate circumstances.

3.title: A Walk on the Beach
3.plot: A high-energy volunteer takes over the show and meets a woman who serves despite the ravages of cancer, a man who holds out hope that the love of his life will one day return, and more.

4.title: Quest for a Story
4.plot: After a lot of trouble finding people to share their stories, Todd meets a widow who shares the unique relationship she had with her late husband.

5.title: The 'Perfect' Family
5.plot: Todd finds a family that looks perfect on the outside but actually shares very difficult struggles that have almost torn them apart.

6.title: Protecting Strangers
6.plot: Todd finds a woman who is using her own painful experience to protect others and a teenager who cherishes friendship because of a tragic loss.

7.title: A Better Life
7.plot: Todd meets a 97-year-old woman and hears her story of immigration through Ellis Island. He also meets two other people in pursuit of the American dream.

8.title: A Marvelous Experience
8.plot: Todd meets perhaps the most interesting man in the world, a woman who is still reconciling something that happened decades earlier, and more.

9.title: The Random Virtuoso
9.plot: Todd meets a world-class musician who gives an impromptu concert on the porch, a woman who focuses on the positive of a terrible tragedy, and a young man with a tale of addiction and overcoming.

10.title: Tough Love
10.plot: Todd ends up in an area of the Great Plains where people are scarce, but great stories are plenty. One of those stories is the compelling drama of a man who says his life was saved thanks to the tough love of his family.

11.title: The Glass Is Always Full
11.plot: Todd comes across an incredible story filled with tragedy and horror, but one woman refuses to let any of it change her positive outlook.

12.title: Serving the Country
12.plot: Todd stumbles on multiple stories from war veterans.

13.title: Season Finale
13.plot: Todd recounts some of his favorite moments and gets updates on past stories.

1.title: A Different Road
1.plot: Todd gets sent to the coast where he meets a widow, a doctor, a dropout, and a dog lover--each drawn to their new hometown by a different road.

2.title: Stay Linked
2.plot: Todd gets sent down south to an area where everything revolves around Friday night football.

3.title: The Accident That Changed My Life
3.plot: Todd meets a young woman who says she shouldn't be alive--but the accident that almost killed her is what saved her from a life she hated.

4.title: Work Now and Play Later
4.plot: Todd meets a young man who says he's considered strange compared to most kids: he's willing to sacrifice now so he can enjoy his life in the future.

5.title: The Unlikely Hero
5.plot: Todd randomly ends up in Cajun country where he meets a hard-driving woman in her nineties, an unlikely hero, and a couple that doesn't let a little thing like a hurricane keep them down.

6.title: My Miracle
6.plot: Todd finds a story of a woman who says the musical "The Miracle on 34th Street" is the miracle that changed her life. He also meets a couple that says it's a miracle that they can keep dancing through life.

7.title: An Amazing Mind
7.plot: Todd meets a small-town genius who says a simple task helps keep him sane. Todd also meets an unlikely rodeo champion and a man who chose health and family over money.

8.title: Friends for Life
8.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

9.title: How to Change the World
9.plot: A spin of the dial randomly sends Todd to the home of a man who says he wants to change the world--so he does! Todd also comes across a father and son with a one-of-a-kind relationship.

10.title: Biker Gangs and Basketball
10.plot: Todd ends up in what is probably the smallest town he has ever visited. He meets both a woman who puts the past behind her after growing up in a biker gang and a family that loves basketball so much that they've made it a lifestyle.

11.title: Piano Prodigies
11.plot: Todd ends up with two different stories about men who've each spent a lifetime in front of the piano. After a serious accident and head injury, one man says his ability to play music was the only thing that wasn't affected.

12.title: Defining Moments
12.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

13.title: The Bullied Beauty Queen
13.plot: Todd meets a young girl who endured bullying, violence, and even death threats that actually helped her to win a crown and take her story to a national stage. Todd also meets an Olympic hopeful and man who 'swings for the fences.'

1.title: Route 66
1.plot: Todd randomly ends up in a small town along historic Route 66 made famous by a song from the seventies. There he meets a man whose friends range from movie stars to murderers.

2.title: The Mamma Bird Man
2.plot: Todd ends up at the home of a man who saved a life and accidentally took on a role he never expected.

3.title: The Child Entrepreneur
3.plot: Todd visits the Midwest and meets a ten-year-old girl who runs her own business and a man who lived on his own at the age of twelve.

4.title: Art Postponed
4.plot: Todd meets a man who had to put down his paint brush to pick up a gun and serve his country. Decades later he's fulfilling a lifelong dream. And a record setting day of door knocking ends up in a blast from Todd's anchorman past.

5.title: Hamming It Up
5.plot: Todd goes back to the Midwest where he meets a man who hams it up on a regular basis, an unlikely college student, and a young man who says a special teacher changed his life.

6.title: The Family Name
6.plot: Todd stumbles upon a young man who made a drastic decision that he knew would disappoint his entire family, but who will stop at nothing to honor his family name.

7.title: The Message
7.plot: Todd ends up in the Great Lakes region where he finds a woman who says an old answering machine message has become a priceless gift. Other stories include a man who says losing his father at a young age has helped him remain healthy.

8.title: God Has Something Better
8.plot: Todd ends up in the Southeast where he finds a woman who is finally back after being away and a woman who turned her life around and led countless others to church.

10.title: The Gregs
10.plot: Todd comes across two men with the same name and a woman whose son saved her life.

11.title: A Family in Crisis
11.plot: Todd comes across a family in the middle of a tragic crisis. Todd also shares the story of a husband and wife dealing with the loss of their daughter.

12.title: A Deadly Plane Crash
12.plot: Todd ends up at the home of a family whose son was one of four people killed in a tragic plane crash just months earlier.

13.title: A Look Back
13.plot: In the season finale, Todd and the crew take a look back at their favorite moments, answer viewer questions, and give a peek behind the scenes.

1.title: Outlaws, Oil and Millionaires
1.plot: A criminal almost sidelines The Story Trek in the land of the dinosaurs. A man who says money is just a number; and a woman abandoned by her mother explains why it's better if some wounds never heal.

2.title: America: The Best of the Best
2.plot: Western Nebraska: home to the Oregon trail and an American patriot from the other side of the world. Meet a woman who proves an object in motion stays in motion and a love story that ends with a broken heart.

3.title: Not So Typical
3.plot: A typical Wyoming rancher proves there's nothing typical about his life and a man who says he's training the ultimate athlete - with four legs. Plus, two brothers who prove nothing is stronger than the bonds that tie family together.

4.title: When Life Throws You a Curve Ball
4.plot: Todd meets a seemingly healthy young man who is struck with a rare disease that brings his dreams crashing down. Then, Todd talks with a man convicted of murder.

5.title: Just One Decision
5.plot: A father who has it all loses everything including his life because of one decision. A six year old boy goes to school and finds out the man who's raised him, isn't his father. His company makes one of the most recognized guns in the world. The story behind Browning Firearms.

6.title: Chasing Your Dreams
6.plot: His dream was to be a big time radio talk show host. When that didn't happen, he created his own show. Find out how this man made his dreams come true and see what happens when he turns the table on Todd. Plus, a man who says you can get it all out of life if you first learn how bad it can be. And the Story Trek randomly ends up in the historic city of Boston, Massachusetts and shows you why millions of people from all over the world come to walk the "red line"

7.title: The Diagnosis
7.plot: On this episode of The Story Trek Todd randomly ends up in New Hampshire where he stumbles across a woman diagnosed with an incurable disease. Rather than seeing it as a death sentence, her young family is using the difficult diagnosis as motivation to live life to the fullest. Other stories include a woman who lived a life of misery, despite having it all and two young men trying to overcome addiction.

8.title: The Cookie Jar Marriage
8.plot: Todd ends up in a small town where he finds out why a simple cookie jar is the secret to a 60 year marriage. Plus, a man shot through the head lives to tell Todd his story. And meet the farmer they call the UFO man.

9.title: The Diva and the Strong Silent Type
9.plot: Todd randomly ends up in the peach state where he meets a brother and sister who prove opposites can have the same DNA. Todd also meets two best friends who are living out their golden years before they retire. And a woman who owns two houses for two very different reasons.

10.title: A Junk Mail Miracle
10.plot: Todd randomly ends up in South Carolina. In a small town, he meets a mother who has a dream about her unborn daughter only to wake up and find a miracle in a pile of junk mail. He also meets a very cool librarian and her military pilot husband who are just days away from becoming parents. Plus, Todd goes for the ride of his life on the back of Miss. Ginny Mae's golf cart.

11.title: Hollywood in the Desert
11.plot: On this episode of The Story Trek, Todd randomly ends up in New Mexico where he meets three very different people all looking for their shot at Hollywood fame.. in the middle of the desert. Todd also meets a girl from the other side of the world who has found her second family in a town of less than 20 people.

12.title: One Tough Girl
12.plot: On this episode of The Story Trek, Todd visits the people who call Utah ski resorts home. He randomly ends up meeting a woman who looks as tough as nails, drives a motorcycle and works in the oil fields. But, don't let her tough exterior fool you. Todd finds out she's been to heaven and back and shares her story of walking towards the light. Plus, living a life full of privilege; why one man made the difficult decision to walk away from it all.

13.title: The Aloha Spirit
13.plot: Todd meets a woman who has spent her life helping people and animals coexist all while battling the devastating effects of depression and a man whose legacy can be seen on the feet of islanders.

0.title: The Best of the Story Trek
0.plot: Todd takes us through some favorite moments from The Story Trek.

1.title: In Love with the Past
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

2.title: You Just Do It
2.plot: Todd meets a woman who was left a widow at thirty-two with eight children and only an eighth grade education whose determination to 'just do it' proved to be a priceless lesson in survival for her daughter decades later.

3.title: The Dream
3.plot: A woman claims she had a dream that Todd would knock on her door. Later Todd speaks with a mother about the consequences of putting her faith before family.

4.title: I Prayed He Would Die
4.plot: Todd travels to Red Rock country where he meets a man who talks openly about the shocking reality of an eleven-year drug addiction and his hard-fought sobriety. His wife shares how his addiction changed her forever.

5.title: Color Blind
5.plot: Todd heads to McCool, Mississippi, where he meets a cool guy who gave up his football dreams to haunt cemeteries and a California girl who says she never noticed skin color until she moved to a Mississippi high school and shares how she saw past it.

6.title: Cowboy Heaven
6.plot: Todd Hansen visits with a man who is raising his very talented granddaughters and learns how music has helped this family overcome the death of a son and uncle.

7.title: The Heart of Dixie
7.plot: In the heart of Dixie, Todd meets a family that needed a foreign country to bring them together and that spends very little time at home in an effort to stay together. Plus, the crew gets a wakeup call from tornado sirens.

8.title: Our Angel
8.plot: Todd talks with a family who has opened their home to their disabled niece. Plus, a woman who grew up in a family owned grocery business shares the lessons she learned while working with her father.

9.title: Riding the Rails
9.plot: Todd travels to northern Wisconsin where he meets a man who saw the US from the back of a boxcar. Todd also visits with two sisters bonded by tragedy; one of their children died and one survived.

10.title: I Wish I Could Go Back
10.plot: On the season finale, Todd travels to the land of 10,000 lakes and meets two divorcees having two very different experiences. One has healed while the other wonders if he'll ever find love again after the mistake he's made. Todd also makes a visit to the Twin Cities and the famous Mall of America.

1.title: In Seven Minutes
1.plot: In the season premiere, Todd meets a seventeen-year-old missionary with a dark secret that his own parents didn't know until he told Todd. He also talks with a couple who've parented nearly eighty children.

2.title: $100 a Day
2.plot: Todd talks with a woman who was left a widow--twice. She shares her advice on getting through the heartache. Todd also talks with a thirty-year veteran of the classroom who says America's youth are falling apart and technology is to blame.

3.title: Changing Directions
3.plot: Todd ends up on the shores of the Chesapeake Bay where he meets four strong women with amazing stories of change. And you won't believe what Todd does to find a story after an interviewee changes her mind. It's a first for the show.

4.title: I Should Be Dead
4.plot: Todd finds himself in an old mining town full of history. An inspiring story rolls up on him unexpectedly. It's a story of survival after a tragic gun accident and how the victim sees his lifelong handicap as a blessing.

5.title: Old Dominion
5.plot: Todd ends up in southern Virginia. He steps back in time to see the slow pace of historic plantation life, and then he experiences life in the fast lane in an area known for modern day raceways.

6.title: The Fight Back
6.plot: Todd meets a man who lived on the streets of Colorado as a teen. Plus, woman found her dream by training Olympians. Now she's helping all athletes from little league to professionals come back from concussions.

7.title: Role of a Lifetime
7.plot: Todd meets a man who dreamed of making it big on the stage only to give it all up for a job he still doesn't want and shares why he'd do it all again. Todd also meets a big-mouthed New Yorker who has found her place in small town Vermont.

8.title: The Cat That Saved My Life
8.plot: Todd meets a man who says a cat that followed him home saved him and put his life back on track. Plus, Todd bumps into a young film student who's hoping to make it big in the movie business and a woman who says she was born a grandma.

9.title: Upstate Cinderella
9.plot: Todd meets an accomplished artist who fills the world with beauty because she was once a real-life Cinderella. Then, Todd knocks on the door of two newlyweds who are leaving the United States after saying their country let them down.

10.title: Pennies from Heaven
10.plot: Todd meets a widow who explains that finding pennies is a priceless gift in her life--and a message from heaven.

1.title: No Complaints
1.plot: Todd heads to the Jersey shore. His random search for stories gets him kicked out of town by police and he brainstorms new ways to find people to interview. In the end, Todd finds inspiring stories of people who share a similar message.

2.title: Medals Don't Matter
2.plot: Todd finds himself in the first state: Delaware. He stumbles across a war hero who says the medals he received for heroism in battle don't matter and a woman is surprised with a baby she was told she could never have.

3.title: The Torrey Trek
3.plot: Todd finds a man who loves the show, because this man is just as passionate about capturing stories as Todd. Also, Todd learns the ups and downs of owning your own motel when he decides to knock on a motel door for the first time ever.

4.title: Hidden Treasure
4.plot: Todd heads to America's Heartland where he meets a woman who felt inspired to turn items people throw away into a community treasure and a young lady who's overcome anxiety and depression.

5.title: Blind Optimism
5.plot: Todd meets a man who gradually lost his sight, adapting to a world he can no longer see. Also, an immigrant who can craft anything from a violin to a custom firearm is now homeless, and a woman is working on her fifth degree.

6.title: The Last Frontier
6.plot: Todd finds himself in Alaska where he takes flight into the back country with a veteran bush pilot. Also, a respected elder of a tribe now spends many of her days alone, and an eleven-year-old boy is planning to take the country by sport.

7.title: Time Plays On
7.plot: Todd finds a town that time has forgotten, and meets a man who spends most of his days living in a blue box. Also, a woman who has been playing the organ for her church congregation for the past seventy years shows no signs of slowing down.

8.title: A Higher High
8.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

9.title: 100 and counting
9.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

10.title: Habit Forming
10.plot: On the season finale, Todd ends up in Maine where a lobster fisherman tests Todd's skills-and nose-at baiting lobster traps. Todd then finds an amazing story of two women learning to be nuns, and they perform a new jingle for the show.

imdb.title: The Story Trek
plot: Former TV news reporter Todd Hansen sets out to prove that everyone has a great story to share. Hansen randomly travels the country knocking on doors. The first person to agree to be on TV is a part of the show.::Anonymous
